response.original_title: Being a White Student at a Historically Black College
response.overview: "On this episode of 'MINORITY REPORTS,' we met up with Tiago, a white freshman at Morehouse College, an HBCU in Atlanta that counts Martin Luther King, Jr. and Spike Lee as alumni.  "We sat down with him to hear why he decided to enroll in the school, asked his peers for their thoughts on having white students on campus, and followed along as he showed us what itâ€™s like to be one of very few non-black students at school."
response.title: Being a White Student at a Historically Black College
